appSlogan: Your space for calm and clarity.

onboarding.title: Welcome to Zen Zone
onboarding.subtitle: Let's set up your profile to personalize your experience.
onboarding.name: Name

dashboardCards.affirmationDefault: Start your day with a positive thought.
dashboardCards.rantChatDescription: Vent your frustrations and receive empathetic, understanding responses from our AI companion.
dashboardCards.guidanceDescription: Get tailored health and wellness advice based on your unique profile and needs.
dashboardCards.moodJournalDescription: Track your daily mood and visualize your emotional patterns over time.
dashboardCards.breathingDescription: Follow a simple visual guide to calm your mind and body with a breathing exercise.
dashboardCards.meditationsDescription: Listen to unique, AI-generated meditation sessions to help you relax and focus.
dashboardCards.audioAffirmationsDescription: Generate and listen to longer, themed audio sessions for positive reinforcement.
dashboardCards.mindfulMomentsDescription: Get a quick, guided audio exercise to return to the present moment.
dashboardCards.sandGardenDescription: Create calming patterns in a virtual sand garden to unwind.
dashboardCards.pocketCoachDescription: Get quick, actionable advice for daily teaching challenges.
dashboardCards.feedbackDescription: If you have any bugs or suggestions, please send them to

breathingPage.instructions: Follow the guide to regulate your breathing. <1/> Feel free to close your eyes and focus on the sensation.

guidancePage.title: Personalized Guidance
guidancePage.description: Based on your profile, what specific wellness questions do you have today?
guidancePage.needsPlaceholder: E.g., 'How can I handle a difficult classroom?' or 'Suggest quick relaxation exercises for a busy day.'

moodJournalPage.title: Mood Journal
moodJournalPage.description: How are you feeling today? Log your mood to track your emotional well-being.
moodJournalPage.loggedToday: You've already logged your mood for today.
moodJournalPage.comeBackTomorrow: Come back tomorrow to log again!
moodJournalPage.notePlaceholder: Add a note about your mood (optional)
moodJournalPage.chartDescription: Visualize your mood patterns over the past week.
moodJournalPage.analysisDescription: Get a summary of your mood patterns over the last 30 days.

rantChatPage.title: Rant Chat
rantChatPage.description: A safe space to let it all out.
rantChatPage.initialMessage: This is a safe space to vent your frustrations. What's on your mind?
rantChatPage.connectionError: I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.

meditationsPage.title: AI Guided Meditations
meditationsPage.description: Select a theme to generate a unique meditation session just for you.
meditationsPage.playerHint: Press play to begin. Close your eyes and relax.

audioAffirmationsPage.title: AI Audio Affirmations
audioAffirmationsPage.description: Select a theme to generate a unique audio affirmation session just for you.
audioAffirmationsPage.playerHint: Press play to begin. Absorb the positivity.

mindfulMomentsPage.title: Mindful Moments
mindfulMomentsPage.description: Get a quick dose of audio mindfulness to bring you back to the present.

sandGardenPage.title: Zen Sand Garden
sandGardenPage.description: Use your cursor to rake patterns in the sand. A simple way to calm your mind.

pocketCoachPage.title: Pocket Coach for Teachers
pocketCoachPage.description: Choose a challenge to get a quick, supportive tip.
pocketCoachPage.errorMessage: Sorry, could not generate a tip right now.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.name: Name
settingsPage.profileUpdatedDesc: Your profile information has been saved.
settingsPage.adminDescription: Unlock administrative features for the app.
settingsPage.adminCodeDesc: Enter the code to enable admin mode.
settingsPage.adminEnabledDesc: You now have access to administrative features.
settingsPage.adminDashboardDesc: Oversee app feedback and generate AI-powered improvements.
settingsPage.aiSuggestionGeneratorDesc: Provide summarized user feedback and usage data to get improvement ideas.

whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.description: Here's a look at the latest features and improvements we've added to enhance your Zen Zone experience:

features.pocketCoach: **Pocket Coach for Teachers:** A brand new feature providing instant, AI-powered tips for common classroom stressors.
features.aboutPage: **New & Improved 'About' Page:** A completely redesigned landing page with more information about our philosophy and a clear 'How It Works' guide.
features.images: **Better Imagery:** We've replaced generic placeholders with beautiful, meaningful images that better represent our features.
features.breathingFix: **Breathing Tool Fixed:** We've squashed the bugs on the breathing exercise page for a smoother, more calming experience.
features.fullSuite: **And More!** Explore our full suite of tools including Guided Meditations, a Rant Chat, a Mood Journal, and more.
